video.title: The Travel Bug
video.synopsis: Host Morgan Burrett travels around the world in search of adventure, soaking up the local culture and visiting each nation's most unique destinations.

episodes.synopsis: Often considered the jewel of the Pacific, Tahiti has some of the world's most amazing beaches and aquatic life, along with world-class resorts.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Papua New Guinea is a diverse and dramatic landscape, with unique culture, a colorful history and natural diversity unlike anywhere else on earth.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Morgan ventures off the beaten path to see Japan's famous hot springs, snow monkeys, the temples of Nagano and the ski fields of Kusatsu.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Morgan visits some of Tokyo's most unique destinations, including a ninja-themed restaurant, the streets of Harajuku and the temples of Asakusa.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Countless islands dotted with sandy beaches make up the Philippines, home to unusual animals, unique foods and a colorful history.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Morgan begins his Australian adventure in Sydney, crossing the Harbour Bridge before heading west to the ancient landscape of Mungo National Park.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Morgan gets a warm welcome from the people of Vanuatu, an island with beautiful beaches, rain forests and plenty of adventure.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: South Korea is a mix of the ancient and the modern. Morgan visits Seoul, where towering high-rise buildings coexist with peaceful temples.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: From scaling volcanoes to surfing, Hawaii offers plenty of adventure -- not to mention relaxing beaches, plenty of shopping and delicious cuisine.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In Taipei, Morgan samples street food, learns about Taiwan's turbulent history and visits the world's second-tallest building, Taipei 101.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Morgan continues his travels in Taiwan, taking in the explosive Beehive Rocket Festival and the breathtaking Alishan Mountains.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Morgan road trips through New Zealand's South Island, where he spots scenery featured in "The Lord of the Rings" and walks on a glacier.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After swimming with sea lions and tuna, Morgan heads through wineries and mountains on the way to the deserts of the Australian Outback.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The first leg of Morgan's visit to Canada takes him to the country's most famous wine region, the spectacular Rocky Mountains and the desert.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Morgan heads east to the French-settled areas of Canada, learning about the area's history as he visits Toronto, Ottawa and Montreal.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Friendly locals welcome Morgan to beautiful Fiji, where he takes in the sights and learns about the island nation's cultural diversity.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Catch highlights from Morgan's Season 2 adventures and visit the exotic Lord Howe Island, located in the Tasman Sea between Australia and New Zealand.
episodes.title: Episode 11
